ComicInfo.Title: Hometown Boy
ComicInfo.Summary: Hometown Boy: Spider-Man and Iron Man are in Cleveland for an engineering convention when they find out the hard way that the city is Blacklash's home town.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:49:11. [Issue ID 39102]
